sentences.sContent: She did not care for the idea of socializing with her clients. It would detract from her professional detachment.
sentences.sCn: 她不喜欢跟客户们有社交往来。这会影响她的职业客观性。

synos.tran: 分离，拆开；超然；分遣；分遣队

phrases.pCn: 拆离断层；滑脱断层；脱顶断层；挤离断层

words.tran: 可分开的；可拆开的；可分遣的

trans.tranCn: 分离，拆开；超然；分遣；分遣队
trans.tranOther: the state of not reacting to or being involved in something in an emotional way
